result.html: Bhí mé pósta ach tá mé colscartha anoisI was married but I'm divorced now.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé pósta aċ tá mé colscarṫa anoisI was married but I'm divorced now.

result.eng: I'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.
result.ga: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anois
result.orig: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anois
result.html: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anoisI'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé pósta aċ tá mé ag siúl amaċ le duine éigin le trí bliana anoisI'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.

result.eng: We've been there for two years now.
result.ga: Táimid ansin le dhá bhliain anois
result.orig: Táimid ansin le dhá bhliain anois
result.html: Táimid ansin le dhá bhliain anoisWe've been there for two years now.
result.ponchtml: Táimid ansin le ḋá ḃliain anoisWe've been there for two years now.

result.eng: We've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.
result.ga: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teach anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leis
result.orig: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teach anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leis
result.html: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teach anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leisWe've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.
result.ponchtml: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teaċ anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leisWe've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.

result.eng: I listen to the radio now and again.
result.ga: Éistim leis an raidió anois is arís
result.orig: Éistim leis an raidió anois is arís
result.html: Éistim leis an raidió anois is arísI listen to the radio now and again.
result.ponchtml: Éistim leis an raidió anois is arísI listen to the radio now and again.

result.eng: Are you tired now?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú tuirseach anois
result.orig: An bhfuil tú tuirseach anois
result.html: An bhfuil tú tuirseach anoisAre you tired now?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú tuirseaċ anoisAre you tired now?

result.eng: That doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ga: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.orig: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.html: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫiteann sin amaċ ċoṁ minic anois agus a ṫitfeaḋ blianta beaga ó ẛinThat doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.

result.eng: She had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ga: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.orig: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anois
result.html: Gheall sí dó é – ní fhéadfadh sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.
result.ponchtml: Ġeall sí dó é – ní ḟéadfaḋ sí dul siar air sin anoisShe had promised it to him – she couldn't back out now.

result.eng: As we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ga: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn
result.orig: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn
result.html: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ponchtml: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.

result.eng: Osama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.
result.ga: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anois
result.orig: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anois
result.html: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlach a shaighdiúirí marbh anoisOsama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.
result.ponchtml: Tá Osama Bin Laden agus tromlaċ a ẛaiġdiúirí marḃ anoisOsama Bin Laden and most of his soldiers are dead now.

result.eng: We live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.
result.ga: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil
result.orig: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndomhan nua anois a bhuíochas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórtha eile nach bhfuil ann níos mó chun é a fheiceáil

result.ponchtml: Táimid inár gcónaí i ndoṁan nua anois a ḃuíoċas do Bin Laden Mohammed Atta agus na scórṫa eile naċ ḃfuil ann níos mó ċun é a ḟeiceáilWe live in a new world now, thanks to Bin Laden, Mohammed Atta and scores of others who are not there anymore to see it.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais

result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.

result.eng: But many of them look tired now.

result.eng: Twitter, the choice means of communication in fashion right now.

result.eng: The old barracks are in public ownership now.

result.eng: Now now, that's enough talking.

result.eng: Now now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.

result.eng: It is only now that things started to be bad in earnest.
result.ga: Ba mhaith riamh é go dtí seo

result.eng: I am beyond advice now.
result.ga: Tá mé thar chomhairle anois

result.ponchtml: Tá mé ṫar ċoṁairle anoisI am beyond advice now.

result.eng: It would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
